评论详情: Christmas present for a friends daughter and she absolutely loved it!

It’s very cute and it’s not like people are going to touch it once it’s on, but it is so light and feels cheaper than Mardi Gras Beads. The length and the visual appeal is perfectly fine and I like it okay, but I feel like once you have it in your hands you will understand. The people I have shown the necklace go from “Awe thats cute! :D” to “oh… :/“ after holding it.  I can’t complain too much, it was gifted to me for Christmas and it’s only $9, but I feel like I would have rather the $9 if I was the one spending the money and that’s not even including the shipping/taxes.
Arrived broken, but just before the party I bought it for, so I made do. It was shorter than I anticipated, being a rosary style.

The necklace looked great in the photo.  Upon arrival it was quite underwhelming, the quality of the beads and the metal was not too good and it was much shorter than expected.  I purchased based on the great reviews but just didn't work for me so I returned it.  I'm giving it 4 stars because I know I have very high expectations and the necklace did arrive without damage.

The necklace itself looks really nice but once I opened it I noticed it is extremely small like for a small child neck, also it smells like rusted iron, seems like it is just one of those fantasy metal jewelry for costumes and not something you can wear regularly. If you are an adult with a big neck like myself it will be hard to faded on your neck without looking like a choker.
The necklace is cute but it came missing the two small ankhs. It only had the beads, bat and large ankh so im a bit disappointed but still cute ig
Mt daughter loved it.
It broke within a week of me owning it. I just took it off one day and it just fell apart.
The part that hangs down came broken but I fixed it myself with some wire and pliers. It’s nice and lightweight but that did bother me so 4/5

评论概述: cute but material isnt my fave
评论详情: its cheaply made but it is cute ill give you that, i guess it was worth the money i will bw wearing this!

The reason i’m giving it two stars, is because this is the 2nd time purchasing it & the length of the necklace has changed and the product itself seems cheaper. The length is much shorter than the first one & it fell apart within the first two weeks. Really disappointed because I thought I’d be getting the same quality product as the first one. Idk why they changed it but, I don’t think I’ll be purchasing again.

Super cute and good quality

评论详情: I got these as a gift for my friend and I thought they would be so cute and they were it’s just the necklace broke pretty easily so I don’t recommend as a gift

Cross breaks off pretty easy
broke four days into wearing but can fix with pliers

As you can see in my video, the bottom part of the rosary snapped during this photo shoot. I didn't have time to fix it so I just had to roll with it. It's my favorite necklace, but since it pops apart so much I've resorted to carrying needle nose pliers with me everywhere I go. It broke after 2 wears but if you take good care of it, it'll last a good while. I'd recommend investing in a better rosary. This ones feels like it caters to fast fashion. It's cute in a pinch! I've gotten lots of compliments on it.

Besides the general quality you’d expect with a cheap gothic rosary necklace, I dare say I’d expected the neck loop to be longer. The chain itself for the neck, including beads, is incredibly short. So short that, while it does fasten, it’s a bit tighter than your average jewelers necklace. As in your average $1.50 chain necklace from Walmart has more throat slack than this. It’s only a rosary in general style, but I wouldn’t really classify it as one. There’s barely any dangle to it. It’s longest point didn’t even reach more than an inch and a half past my collarbone… much, MUCH shorter than an actual rosary necklace. FWIW I come from a heavily Christian family with Baptists, Catholics and Eastern European Orthodox thrown in. Buy it if you want, but for the same price I’d recommend to get one similar from Etsy… otherwise you’ll have to purchase other pieces to tailor it a bit. Honestly, it’s cute in the ad photo, especially cute as far as talismans go for a goth such as myself, but actual wearability? It’ll need to be altered.
Great quality and great buy.
i love the way this necklace looks but it’s been broken and fixed so many times at this point it’s actually crazy lol. as long as you can keep track of the broken pieces it’s great

评论概述: Should come with a free pair of needle nose pliers…
评论详情: Seriously. Aesthetically this is one of my favorite necklaces I’ve owned, but god is it fragile. The “hooks” that connect each bead to the other are made of very soft and malleable metal that will open up under the slightest pressure, but luckily this also means it can be closed and fixed just as easily. It imitates a rosary and the ankh is directly modeled after the symbol of Vampire: The Masquerade revised edition. Super cute, but wouldn’t recommend it to someone who isn’t comfortable repairing minor breaks in jewelry.
I’ve worn this everyday since I’ve gotten it a couple months ago however the ahnk broke off sadly, it was a staple for me, tbh I’m still rocking it with just the bat and beads.
It broke in the one minute that I had it. I put it on and the entire bottom piece broke off.
Really cute. Just not the strongest. One small tug and mine broke, I’ve had it for less than a week. For nearly $12 you might as well buy it in parts and make it yourself. Really disappointed

tbh, it's great. i dont (really) have anything negative to say about it. it looks so awesome. idk what the ankh at the bottom is made of, but i was able to bend it a bit. so i advise to be careful with it!! but overall its pretty awesome. i honestly love it
